## resetExpositionValues() function

Reset the values of a given exposition `Exposition` ‚è∞

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function resetExpositionValues<TExposition extends Exposition<any>>(exposition: TExposition, scenariosToReset?: (keyof TExposition)[]): TExposition;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  exposition | TExposition |  |
|  scenariosToReset | (keyof TExposition)\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> selection of scenarios that should be resetted to their initial value |

<b>Returns:</b>

TExposition

`Exposition`

## Example

const exposition = createExposition(<!-- -->{ user: { options: \['Dio üåé', 'JoJo üåü'\] }<!-- -->, } as const)

exposition.user.value = 'JoJo üåü'

const resettedExposition = resetExpositionValues(exposition) getExpositionValues(resettedExposition) // { user: "Dio üåé" }
